parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The ID of the associated domain.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the associated domain.

nested_items.name: SpaceArn
nested_items.description: The space's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: SpaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the space.

nested_items.name: HomeEfsFileSystemUid
nested_items.description: The ID of the space's profile in the Amazon EFS volume.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason.

nested_items.name: SpaceSettings
nested_items.description: A collection of space settings.

nested_items.name: JupyterServerAppSettings
nested_items.description: The JupyterServer app settings.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceSpec
nested_items.description: The default instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the default SageMaker AI image used by the JupyterServer app. If you use the LifecycleConfigArns parameter, then this parameter is also required.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker AI image that the image version belongs to.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance. To clear the value set for SageMakerImageVersionArn, pass None as the value.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionAlias
nested_items.description: The SageMakerImageVersionAlias of the image to launch with. This value is in SemVer 2.0.0 versioning format.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration attached to the Resource.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configurations attached to the JupyterServerApp. If you use this parameter, the DefaultResourceSpec parameter is also required.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CodeRepositories
nested_items.description: A list of Git repositories that SageMaker AI automatically displays to users for cloning in the JupyterServer application.

nested_items.name: RepositoryUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the Git repository.

nested_items.name: KernelGatewayAppSettings
nested_items.description: The KernelGateway app settings.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceSpec
nested_items.description: The default instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the default SageMaker AI image used by the KernelGateway app.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker AI image that the image version belongs to.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance. To clear the value set for SageMakerImageVersionArn, pass None as the value.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionAlias
nested_items.description: The SageMakerImageVersionAlias of the image to launch with. This value is in SemVer 2.0.0 versioning format.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration attached to the Resource.

nested_items.name: CustomImages
nested_items.description: A list of custom SageMaker AI images that are configured to run as a KernelGateway app.
On a domain level: 200
On a space level: 5
On a user profile level: 5

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configurations attached to the the user profile or domain.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CodeEditorAppSettings
nested_items.description: The Code Editor application settings.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceSpec
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN's of a SageMaker AI image and SageMaker AI image version, and the instance type that the version runs on.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker AI image that the image version belongs to.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance. To clear the value set for SageMakerImageVersionArn, pass None as the value.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionAlias
nested_items.description: The SageMakerImageVersionAlias of the image to launch with. This value is in SemVer 2.0.0 versioning format.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration attached to the Resource.

nested_items.name: AppLifecycleManagement
nested_items.description: Settings that are used to configure and manage the lifecycle of CodeEditor applications in a space.

nested_items.name: IdleSettings
nested_items.description: Settings related to idle shutdown of Studio applications.

nested_items.name: IdleTimeoutInMinutes
nested_items.description: The time that SageMaker waits after the application becomes idle before shutting it down.

nested_items.name: JupyterLabAppSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for the JupyterLab application.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceSpec
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN's of a SageMaker AI image and SageMaker AI image version, and the instance type that the version runs on.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker AI image that the image version belongs to.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance. To clear the value set for SageMakerImageVersionArn, pass None as the value.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionAlias
nested_items.description: The SageMakerImageVersionAlias of the image to launch with. This value is in SemVer 2.0.0 versioning format.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration attached to the Resource.

nested_items.name: CodeRepositories
nested_items.description: A list of Git repositories that SageMaker automatically displays to users for cloning in the JupyterLab application.

nested_items.name: RepositoryUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the Git repository.

nested_items.name: AppLifecycleManagement
nested_items.description: Settings that are used to configure and manage the lifecycle of JupyterLab applications in a space.

nested_items.name: IdleSettings
nested_items.description: Settings related to idle shutdown of Studio applications.

nested_items.name: IdleTimeoutInMinutes
nested_items.description: The time that SageMaker waits after the application becomes idle before shutting it down.

nested_items.name: AppType
nested_items.description: The type of app created within the space.

nested_items.name: SpaceStorageSettings
nested_items.description: The storage settings for a space.

nested_items.name: EbsStorageSettings
nested_items.description: A collection of EBS storage settings for a space.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumeSizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of an EBS storage volume for a space.

nested_items.name: SpaceManagedResources
nested_items.description: If you enable this option, SageMaker AI creates the following resources on your behalf when you create the space:
The user profile that possesses the space.
The app that the space contains.

nested_items.name: CustomFileSystems
nested_items.description: A file system, created by you, that you assign to a space for an Amazon SageMaker AI Domain. Permitted users can access this file system in Amazon SageMaker AI Studio.

nested_items.name: EFSFileSystem
nested_items.description: A custom file system in Amazon EFS.

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: The ID of your Amazon EFS file system.

nested_items.name: FSxLustreFileSystem
nested_items.description: A custom file system in Amazon FSx for Lustre.

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: Amazon FSx for Lustre file system ID.

nested_items.name: RemoteAccess
nested_items.description: A setting that enables or disables remote access for a SageMaker space. When enabled, this allows you to connect to the remote space from your local IDE.

nested_items.name: OwnershipSettings
nested_items.description: The collection of ownership settings for a space.

nested_items.name: OwnerUserProfileName
nested_items.description: The user profile who is the owner of the space.

nested_items.name: SpaceSharingSettings
nested_items.description: The collection of space sharing settings for a space.

nested_items.name: SharingType
nested_items.description: Specifies the sharing type of the space.

nested_items.name: SpaceDisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the space that appears in the Amazon SageMaker Studio UI.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: Returns the URL of the space. If the space is created with Amazon Web Services IAM Identity Center (Successor to Amazon Web Services Single Sign-On) authentication, users can navigate to the URL after appending the respective redirect parameter for the application type to be federated through Amazon Web Services IAM Identity Center.
Studio Classic: &redirect=JupyterServer.
JupyterLab: &redirect=JupyterLab.
Code Editor, based on Code-OSS, Visual Studio Code - Open Source: &redirect=CodeEditor.
